issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Selecting respective proporties & tapping on show picker does not give us any list to select people from.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:

Iphone:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for Windows Phone mango). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on phone tab.
6.Tap on the contacts table row.
7.Tap on the contact picker table row.
8.Select the appropriate proporties using the buttons(make sure stop on person is ON).
9.Tap on show picker.
10.Notice that we do not get any list to select contacts from.

Windows Phone Mango:
1.Unable to scroll the page down thus cant unhide the contacts table row.Thus,further execution of the test case is blocked.

Actual result:
1.Selecting respective proporties & tapping on show picker does not show us any list to select contacts from.

Expected result:
1.Tapping on show picker should give us a list to select people from.
2.Tap on any contact.
3.You should see the selected name on the screen.
4.Tap on stop on property.
5.Tap on show picker & select a contact from the list.
6.You should get info of the selected contact on the screen.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Phone-->Contacts-->Contacts Picker:Selecting respective proporties & tapping on show picker does not give us any list to select people from.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206062004
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v20120607000247
Iphone 4.3.5
Windows Phone Mango

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
